inject-button.Name: Display Reminder button?
inject-button.Hint: Controls whether or not Reminders can be opened from the player list.

deleteConfirm.Title: Delete Reminder?
deleteConfirm.Content: Are you sure you want to delete this Reminder? This action cannot be undone.

deleteCompletedConfirm.Title: Delete Completed Reminder(s)?
deleteCompletedConfirm.Content: Are you sure you want to delete all completed Reminders? This action cannot be undone.
